title: Ticket #6039: Daemon client should ignore LOCALNAME param prefix when self==subsys
description:
When a daemon with a LOCALNAME (say the VIEW_COLLECTOR) tries to instantiate a Daemon object, we want to ignore LOCALNAME overrides while initializing those objects when the daemon we are trying to lookup has the same subsystem as we do. Otherwise a VIEW_COLLECTOR that tries to lookup the COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE ends up getting the VIEW_COLLECTOR.COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE instead.

This is part of the general cleanup of the mechanisms for creating secondary daemons like view collectors and secondary schedds.
